settings.name: metadata_url
settings.label: Metadata URL
settings.description: Airtable metadata URL, at the time of the update - "https://api.airtable.com/v2/meta/"

settings.name: records_url
settings.label: Records URL
settings.description: Airtable content URL, at the time of the update - "https://api.airtable.com/v0/"

settings.name: selected_by_default
settings.label: Selected By Default
settings.description: Default for every table in the base. If set to true, all of the tables in the schema will be syncronized

settings.name: remove_emojis
settings.label: Remove Emojis
settings.description: Filter out emojis from the scyncronization
